title: Gobybike: Interactive Map of Bike Traffic Data
description: An immersive, interactive map visualization of bike traffic for Boston area bike stations during different times of the day; includes zooming and panning, traffic labels and coloring, and a slider for time filtering

title: Expository Climate Data Visualization
description: A static visualization providing a comparison between 2 U.S. cities and the ideal agricultural climate conditions.

title: Peanut Butter Recipes Analysis
description: An analysis of a recipes dataset, with a focus on the use of peanut butter as an ingredient.

title: Loan Applications Project
description: Analysis of a small loans dataset from LendingClub.

title: Gradebook Project
description: Exploration and analysis of a fictional data science course gradebook.

title: Social Media Sentiment Analysis
description: Sentiment analysis of social media posts and comments.

title: Movie Recommendation System
description: Development of system to recommend movies based on user data.

title: Stock Price Predictions
description: Development of system to predict stock prices based on performance history.

title: Fake News Detection
description: Use of classifiers to distinguish between real and fake news articles.

title: Customer Segmentation
description: K-means clustering to categorize customers based on features.

title: California Native Plants Analysis
description: Analysis of California native plant species data.
